page.title: 16Clubs
page.content: Silver Wings The Rawcliffe Bridge Silver Wings Junior Jazz Band was first formed in 1979. The band uniform was green and white. In 1982 the unforms was changed to the "Lord of Isles" tartan. The band competes in competitions every weekend, also in private galas and shows. They train every Wednesday and Friday in Rawcliffe Bridge School Hall. They are trained by trainers. Mr John Harrison is the kazoo trainer. Mr Mel Featherstone is the drum trainer. Mr Mick Norman is the banner trainer. In 1985 the band qualified for the world championships, which are going to be held at Stockton in August. Also in September the band are in the all England Championships.
